   -------------------- P R O J . 4 --------------------

This is a pre-built Release 4.4 of cartographic projection software.
The full source is available at: http://trac.osgeo.org/proj/

The source for this projection library is available under an MIT-style 
license, as described here: 
http://trac.osgeo.org/proj/wiki/WikiStart#License

For more information on PROJ.4 maintenance please see the web page at:

  http://www.remotesensing.org/proj
                or
  http://trac.osgeo.org/proj/

   ---------------------------------------------------

The directory structure is as follows:
 
  include/ 
  lib/<platform>/
